Source.Name: tcpdump
Source.Description: Tcpdump prints out a description of the contents of packets on a network interfacethat matches a given expression, allowing targeted analysis. It can save data to files for analysis later as well.

Package.Name: tcpdump
Package.Description: Tcpdump prints out a description of the contents of packets on a network interfacethat matches a given expression, allowing targeted analysis. It can save data to files for analysis later as well.
